Title: Requires hotels and motels to maintain a roster of guests, including their photo identifications, for five years and security footage for ninety days and restricts the use of hourly rates at hotels and motels
Summary: Requires hotels and motels to maintain a roster of guests, including their photo identifications, for five years and security footage for ninety days; restricts the use of hourly rates at hotels and motels; increases penalties therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring hotels and motels to maintain a roster of guests, including their photo identifications, for five years and security footage for ninety days and restricting the use of hourly rates at hotels and motels
